DOC.brief_title: PulseHaler Drug Deposition Study Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Patients
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) , establish least 1 year Postbronchodilator FEV1/FVC < 0.7 Postbronchodilator FEV1 range 30 % 70 % predicted Age : 40 year old Patient sign informed consent form Pneumothorax past , per anamnesis . Women age fertility , pregnant , plan pregnancy , use contraceptive . Severe cardiac disease , e.g. , Congestive Heart Failure ( CHF ) grade 3 high Coronary Artery Bypass Graft ( CABG ) Acute Myocardial Infarction ( MI ) within last 3 month Other severe systemic disease Noncooperative noncompliant patient
